```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
tokyuStationTimetables = jsonlite::fromJSON("data/odpt_StationTimetable[Tokyu].json")
tokyuStationTimetables %>% 
  filter(`odpt:calendar` == "odpt.Calendar:Weekday") %>% 
  select(calendar = `odpt:calendar`, station = `odpt:station`, timetable = `odpt:stationTimetableObject`) %>% 
  unnest(timetable, .sep = ".")
```
